g:HTMLPanel.p: This program will scan a protein of your choice for all of the motifs in Scansite, for a subset of them, or for a motif you prepared and uploaded. You can either use a protein entry in public databases (SwissProt, TrEMBL, Genpept, Ensembl, Yeast), or your own protein sequence.

ol.li: Search a database protein Vs. search your own protein by providing an input sequence
Choose your sequence motif reference by picking either all motifs, select specific ones or even upload your own motif
Choose your motif class by selecting either Mammalian or Yeast
Choose a stringency to determine whether only very good results should be displayed or also matches with worse scores
Dieplay the protein domains and a table with references to protein families
Decide whether all results or only those, that have previously been matched by PhosphoSitePlus
Decide whether the default or an alternative reference proteome should be used for scoring
